Question
========
Suppose we wanted to test a hypothesis about comparing two groups as rigorous test (want to make the probability as small as possible that we can reject the null hypothesis). In what way should we then test?

Answerlist
----------
* We test one-sided and use an alpha of 1%.
* We test one-sided and apply an alpha of 5%.
* We test two-sided and apply an alpha of 1%.
* We test two-sided and apply an alpha of 5%.
